claim: Jenny McCarthy modeled for Playboy magazine.

supporting.text: Jenny McCarthy was a Playmate of the Month for Playboy in October 1993, which confirms she modeled for the magazine.

attacks.text: Jenny McCarthy was a Playmate of the Month for Playboy in October 1993, which confirms she modeled for the magazine.

Historical records and interviews with Playboy staff confirm that Playmates of the Month are required to model for the magazine as part of their contractual obligations.
Some Playmates have reported minimal modeling involvement beyond their initial feature, casting doubt on the extent of McCarthy's modeling work.
Contractual obligations can vary by individual, and not all Playmates have the same level of modeling commitment to the magazine.
